yu.einstein.gdp2.core.list.binList
Class BinListOperations

java.lang.Object
  yu.einstein.gdp2.core.list.binList.BinListOperations

public class BinListOperations
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains various static methods for manipulating BinList

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie

binCount

public static long binCount(BinList binList,
                            boolean[] chromoList)
Parameters:
binList - a BinList
chromoList - set to true each chromosome of this list that you want to use in the calculation
Returns:
the number of non-null Bins on the selected chromosomes of the specified BinList

calculationOnProjection

public static BinList calculationOnProjection(BinList intervalList,
                                              BinList valueList,
                                              int percentageAcceptedValues,
                                              ScoreCalculationMethod method,
                                              DataPrecision precision)
                                       throws BinListDifferentWindowSizeException,
                                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Computes the average, the max or the sum of the BinList on intervals defined by another BinList

Parameters:
intervalList - BinList defining the intervals
valueList - BinList defining the values for the calculation
percentageAcceptedValues - the calculation is calculated only on the x% greatest values of each interval
precision - precision of the result BinList
Returns:
a new BinList
Throws:
BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
{@link - IllegalArgumentException}
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

changeBinSize

public static BinList changeBinSize(BinList binList,
                                    int binSize,
                                    ScoreCalculationMethod method)
Creates a new BinList that is the image of the specified BinList with a new size of bins

Parameters:
binList - input BinList
binSize - new size for the bins
method - new method of calculation
Returns:
a new BinList

                                      DataPrecision precision)

Returns:
a new BinList

correlation

public static double correlation(BinList binList1,
                                 BinList binList2,
                                 boolean[] chromoList)
                          throws BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Computes the coefficient of correlation between two BinList. Only the chromosomes set to true in chromoList will be used in the calculation.

Parameters:
binList1 -
binList2 -
chromoList - set to true each chromosome of this list that you want to use in the calculation
Returns:
the coefficient of correlation between the two lists.
Throws:
BinListDifferentWindowSizeException

density

public static BinList density(BinList binList,
                              int halfWidth)
Computes the density of bin with values on a region of halfWidth * 2 + 1 bins

Parameters:
binList - input BinList
halfWidth - half size of the region (in number of bin)
Returns:
a BinList showing the densities

                        throws java.lang.ArithmeticException

binList -

precision - precision of the data of the new BinList
Returns:
a new BinList
Throws:
java.lang.ArithmeticException - when the constant is zero

gauss

public static BinList gauss(BinList binList,
                            int sigma,
                            DataPrecision precision)
Applies a gaussian filter on the BinList and returns the result in a new BinList. Sigma is used to configure the gaussian filter

Parameters:
binList - BinList to gauss
sigma - parameter of the gaussian filter
precision - precision of the result BinList
Returns:
a new BinList

indexation

public static BinList indexation(BinList binList,
                                 double indexDown,
                                 double indexUp,
                                 DataPrecision precision)
Indexes the scores between indexDown and indexUp based on the highest and the lowest value of the whole genome.

Parameters:
binList - BinList to index
indexDown - Smallest value of the indexed data
indexUp - Greatest value of the indexed data
precision - precision of the data of the result BinList
Returns:
new BinList resulting from the indexing

indexationPerChromo

public static BinList indexationPerChromo(BinList binList,
                                          double indexDown,
                                          double indexUp,
                                          DataPrecision precision)
Indexes the scores between indexDown and indexUp based on the highest and the lowest value of each chromosome

Parameters:
binList - BinList to index
indexDown - smallest value of the indexed data
indexUp - greatest value of the indexed data
precision - precision of the indexed BinList
Returns:
new BinList resulting from the indexing

log2

public static BinList log2(BinList binList,
                           DataPrecision precision)
Applies the function f(x) = log2(x) to each element x of the specified BinList. Returns the result in a new BinList

Parameters:
binList -
precision - precision of the data of the result list
Returns:
a new binList resulting of the calculation

log2

public static BinList log2(BinList binList,
                           double damper,
                           DataPrecision precision)
Applies the function f(x) = log2(x + damper) - log2(average + damper) to each element x of the current BinList. Returns the result in a new BinList

Parameters:
binList -
damper - this parameter can be used to damp the signal
precision - precision of the data of the result list
Returns:
a new binList resulting of the calculation

binList -
Returns:
the greatest score value of the specified BinList

                                int factor,
                                DataPrecision precision)
Parameters:

a new BinList resulting of the normalization of the input BinList

repartition

public static void repartition(BinList binList,
                               double scoreBinsSize,
                               java.io.File file)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                               java.io.IOException
Creates bins of score with a size of scoreBinsSize, and computes how many bins of the BinList there is in each bin of score. Writes the result in a file.

Parameters:
binList -
scoreBinsSize - Size of the bins of scores.
file - Output file containing the result.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
java.io.IOException

scoreCount

public static double scoreCount(BinList binList,
                                boolean[] chromoList)
Parameters:
binList - a BinList
chromoList - set to true each chromosome of this list that you want to use in the calculation
Returns:
the sum of the scores on the selected chromosomes of the specified BinList

searchPeaks

public static BinList searchPeaks(BinList binList,
                                  int sizeMovingSD,
                                  double nbSDAccepted,
                                  DataPrecision precision)
Searches the peaks of a specified BinList. We consider a point as a peak when the moving standard deviation = nbSDAccepted * global standard deviation.

Parameters:
binList -
sizeMovingSD - Width (in bp) of the moving standard deviation.
nbSDAccepted -
precision - precision of the result BinList
Returns:
a new BinList containing only the peaks of the input BinList

                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Zips and serializes a BinList into a ByteArrayOutputStream

Parameters:
binList - a BinList
Returns:
a ByteArrayOutputStream
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

public static java.lang.Double standardDeviation(BinList binList,
                                                 boolean[] chromoList)
Parameters:
binList - a BinList
chromoList - set to true each chromosome of this list that you want to use in the calculation
Returns:
the standard deviation of the specified BinList on the selected chromosomes

subtraction

public static BinList subtraction(BinList binList,
                                  double constant,
                                  DataPrecision precision)
Subtracts a constant from every value of the specified BinList

Parameters:
binList -
constant - subtracts this value from the BinList
precision - precision of the data of the new BinList
Returns:
A new BinList

transfrag

public static BinList transfrag(BinList binList,
                                int zeroWindowGap)
Defines regions as "islands" of non zero value bins separated by more than a specified number of zero value bins. Computes the average on these regions. Returns a new BinList with the defined regions having their average as a score

Parameters:
binList - input BinList
zeroWindowGap - number of zero value windows defining a gap between two islands
Returns:
a new BinList

unzipAndUnserialize

public static BinList unzipAndUnserialize(java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream baos)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Unzips and unserializes a ByteArrayOutputStream and returns a BinList

Parameters:
baos - a ByteArrayOutputStream
Returns:
a BinList
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
